actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to require the use of U.S. materials and products in the construction, alteration, or repair of water, air, or noise pollution control facilities for which Federal assistance is provided.

summary.text: Requires the use of United States materials and products in the construction, alteration, or repair of water, air, or noise pollution control facilities for which Federal assistance is provided, unless the cost would be unreasonable or the use would be inconsistent with the public interest.

titles.title: A bill to require the use of U.S. materials and products in the construction, alteration, or repair of water, air, or noise pollution control facilities for which Federal assistance is provided.
